column2: We believe that the island of Rhodes should be viewed as its own separate island entity, unrelated to the mainland.

Create the Duchy of the Maldives
We believe that the islands of the Maldives should be viewed as their own separate entity, unrelated to the mainland.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is NOT de jure liege of the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] (or one of [Root.GetHerHis] vassals) does NOT own another county title in the same de jure duchy as the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!
The §Y[Prev.GetFullName]§! becomes de jure part of the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!
